column5: Our daughter celebrated her 6th bday this weekend! Good times!!!  Saturday morning came and she begged to go fishing... who am I to say no?  But first I had chores etc so when those were done, it was already 5pm by the time we hit the river.  Absolutely gorgoeus out! +21 and barely a breeze!  The bite was slow but we managed a few small walleye and a couple nice crappie?  Really cool thing happened. 4 casts in a row and I caught 4 species...  First came a 26" northern, then a 15" walleye, then a 13" crappie and finally a rock bass. That was pretty cool!  Today we headed out early, again, beauty of a day! By 9am it was already +16. Woot woot  We laid tobacco as per usual and got a nice 19" walleye second cast!  Then a 15"er, a few rock bass, then a hefty 28" pike.  A few more good eaters and she was almost time to head in.  Then bang! Fish on! Not me but Lily! Her first walleye as a 6 year old and she fought it like a champ! Her arms tired, the fish finally showed itself! A quick measure and pic and there it is, her new PB walleye, 18"???  Miigwich for reading
Sweet day! Living the dream!
love it!  and either your head shrunk or that crappie is bigger than 13"...
Looks like great times for sure ! Thanks for sharing .
Great stuff.
Sounds like a awesome fishing day!  Happy birthday to your little girl!
Awesome
Awesome pix Rick!  Happy birthday Lilly.  She's a cutie!  Does she remember me?
She sure does!  Thanks for all the replies guys!  Was a great weekend and Lily had a blast!
Ill pass it on dood!  I cant believe shes 6 already. Crazy how fast it goes by.
Looks like great times for sure ! Thanks for sharing . x2

@jd63  Nothing but GREAT times. Nature is also a pretty good babysitter if ya ask me.  Thanks wkrp, benson and gallie!!!  I never measured it Geoff, just a guess. Maybe 14" but I doubt any bigger. She was fat though! And guess what was in her belly? A frog!  Only fish I measured was Lilys walleye just so I know what she has to beat next time!
Nothing better than time with your kids
Truth bomb Bruce???
certified slab  the pickerel bite is hot and heavy!
gotta love getting the kids onto fish! nice work!  thanks for sharing,  AA.
Nice one's MB! The little one is adorable.
That's what it's all about.   Great day.
Kids in T's and dresses in November... and slaying everything that swims. Very nice dad!!!

Sure is akri! Need it to cool off again for the big girls to bite!  Thats the plan alphaalpha! They wnjoy nature regardless but obviously its waaaay funner when we are catchin fish!  Thanks JoshS! Shes a lil sweetie too! Very polite youngin!  Absolutely Rich!  Thanks bunk!  Yeah its been warm man! Nov 18th is the latest ive ever had the boat in the water. Me thinks thats about to change this year!  Felt kinda odd to be in t shirts to be honest lol
Great family fishing and how's that weather for November, thanks for the report,
^^^ glad you enjoyed! We certainly did!
